items.name: Cap Blanc Scenic Vista
items.short_description: Perched at the edge of the iconic Cap Blanc peninsula, this viewpoint offers breathtaking panoramas where the vast desert meets the Atlantic's azure expanse. Spot diverse birdlife and perhaps even marine mammals from above.

items.name: Nouadhibou Ship Graveyard
items.short_description: Witness an otherworldly landscape where hundreds of abandoned vessels, from fishing boats to cargo ships, slowly rust into the shallow waters. It's a hauntingly beautiful testament to time and the elements, unlike anywhere else.

items.name: Grand Marché de Nouadhibou
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant chaos and rich sensory experience of Nouadhibou's main market. A kaleidoscope of colors, sounds, and aromas, it's where local life truly unfolds and an authentic cultural event in itself.

items.name: Old Quarter's Souk Passages
items.short_description: Wander through the narrow, winding alleys of Nouadhibou's older residential and commercial quarter. Discover hidden shops, traditional homes, and a quiet charm away from the main thoroughfares.

items.name: Traditional Fishing Dhow Display
items.short_description: Along the waterfront, find beautifully preserved traditional Mauritanian fishing dhows, often adorned with colorful patterns. These installations celebrate the city's deep connection to the sea and its ancient fishing heritage.

items.name: Portside Horizon Terrace
items.short_description: Ascend to a high vantage point overlooking Nouadhibou's bustling port and the vast Atlantic beyond. Enjoy a refreshing drink as you watch ships come and go, with the city lights twinkling as dusk settles.

items.name: Desert Meets Ocean Dune Panorama
items.short_description: Just outside the city, witness the dramatic convergence of golden Saharan dunes cascading directly into the vibrant blue of the Atlantic Ocean. This rare landscape provides an epic backdrop for unforgettable photographs.

items.name: Plage de l'Océan
items.short_description: Discover long stretches of golden sand and tranquil waters along Nouadhibou's Atlantic coast. Ideal for a peaceful stroll, beachcombing, or simply soaking in the serene coastal ambiance away from the city's bustle.

items.name: Cap Blanc Oasis Resort Pool
items.short_description: Indulge in a luxurious escape at this imagined oasis, where a stunning infinity pool appears to merge seamlessly with the vast Atlantic Ocean. Enjoy panoramic views and unparalleled relaxation in a sophisticated setting.

items.name: Residence des Pêcheurs Eco-Lodge
items.short_description: Experience the charm of a beachfront eco-lodge designed with local aesthetics and sustainability in mind. Offering a blend of comfort and authentic Mauritanian hospitality, it's a unique stay close to nature.
